title: I can't Post Anywhere but here because my Account is Not "Level 7" but it is....
body: So am I supposed to just put horrible filler posts in this forum to "level up" my boards account so I can actually post in sections I want to? What the hell is this trash system. My account is level 30, I have no idea what this level 7 nonsense is.

replies.body: You could always use the [**Boards Profile Syncing Tool**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool) which is stickied at the very top of H&S. Much quicker and easier way of syncing your accounts.

I clicked the link and assume it should be fine, but how can a billion dollar company in 2017 require its MILLIONS of users to MANUALLY seek out and find a random syncing tool instead of just updating on it's own...unbelievable, honestly. Thanks for the link and the help.

It's not something everyone needs to have done, but a very small group when the boards don't auto sync for you. If it doesn't auto-sync, you then need to just tell the boards to sync your profile, which is what the tool does, or simply post here in H&S which will sync them. Simple enough to fix, glad you found one way and now know the other if this ever happens again ^_^
